project.description: Project ID of jobs to list.

rules: when command is rundeck:list-jobs must have rundeck:read
list-jobs.long_description: List jobs in a project. If "--project" is not specified, use the default.

rules: when command is rundeck:run must have rundeck:run
run.long_description: Run a specific job by its name. If "--project" is not specified, use the default.

project.description: Project ID of jobs to list.

args.description: Arguments to send to the job.

run.examples:
rundeck:run --project myproject myjob
rundeck:run --project myproject --args "some arguments" myjob
rundeck:run myjob

config.notes:
In order to authenticate against Rundeck, you must either use
`RUNDECK_USERNAME` and `RUNDECK_PASSWORD`, or `RUNDECK_TOKEN`.

env.description:
**Required**. The full URL to your Rundeck instance
(e.g., `http://rundeck.example:4440`).

Optional. The default Rundeck project to use if not specified with `--project`
in commands.
